data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sen, Areen, Saha, Ratul, Sivakumar, Kuppuswamy, Bhadury, Punyasloke (2018): Inventorizing the modern benthic foraminiferal assemblage from marginal marine environments across the North West coast of Bay of Bengal. Zootaxa 4441 (2): 245-260, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4441.2.3|2 occurrences
